solution_line_template: He gave {cards_per_student} cards each to {num_students} students for a total of {cards_per_student}*{num_students} = <<{cards_per_student}*{num_students}={cards_given_to_students}>>{cards_given_to_students} cards
He has {cards_left} cards left, so originally the number of cards was {cards_given_to_students}+{cards_left} = {total_cards_at_first} cards
